Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
With major hostilities between the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGreatHouses],Great Houses]] slowly grinding to a halt, and only minor border skirmishes reported - combined with the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFedComAccords],FedCom Accords]] and the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKapteynAccords],Concord of Kapteyn]] coming to fruition, it appears that the Third Succession War is petering out at last.  But how long before some new slight or petty squabble starts up conflicts once again?



[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCorpRedDevilInd],Red Devil Industries]] is at it again with a new [[DM.VehicleDefs[vehicledef_CONDOR_FLAMER].Description,Condor variant]] that concentrates on anti-personnel and short range support.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
On [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSolaris7],Solaris VII]] Hans Moder has fought his way to the top and pulled off his 2nd consecutive Championship in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGrandTournament],Grand Tournament]].  ComStar extends their congratulations!





This has been the CNB November broadcast.
